cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portd to 0 will cause invalid SCTP port configuration and prevent F1-D connection.
cu.explanation_zh: 將 local_s_portd 設定為 0 會導致無效的 SCTP 端口配置，並阻止 F1-D 連接。

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_absoluteFrequencyPointA to an out-of-range value will cause downlink frequency misalignment and prevent downlink transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_absoluteFrequencyPointA 設定為超出範圍的值會導致下行鏈路頻率錯位，並阻止下行鏈路傳輸。
